meanings.definition: A salt or ester of carbamic acid.
meanings.sent1: I learned in science class that a carbamate is a type of salt.
meanings.sent2: The chemist synthesized a carbamate compound in the laboratory.
meanings.sent3: Why did the salt refuse to play cards with the carbamate? Because it was too salty!
meanings.sent4: The carbamate group in the molecule acted like a bridge connecting two parts.
meanings.sent5: The carbamate compound sparkled under the microscope, revealing its unique structure.

meanings.definition: Any compound containing the functional group -NHCOO-.
meanings.sent1: The scientist identified the carbamate in the chemical formula.
meanings.sent2: Carbamate is commonly found in pesticides and herbicides.
meanings.sent3: Why did the functional group throw a party for the carbamate? Because it was the life of the compound!
meanings.sent4: The -NHCOO- group in the molecule resembled a tiny puzzle piece fitting perfectly.
meanings.sent5: Under UV light, the carbamate compound glowed brightly, making it easy to spot in the mixture.
